mapper.select: SELECT * FROM outbox_event WHERE status = 'PENDING' AND (next_retry_time IS NULL OR next_retry_time <= NOW()) ORDER BY create_time ASC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO outbox_event (event_type, payload, status, create_time, entity_id) VALUES (#{eventType}, #{payload}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{entityId})
mapper.update: UPDATE outbox_event SET status = 'FAILED', last_error = #{lastError}, retry_count = COALESCE(retry_count, 0) +1, next_retry_time = #{nextRetryTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE outbox_event SET status = 'DEAD' WHERE id = #{id}
